sentences.en: cows taken for slaughter
sentences.cn: 待宰奶牛

sentences.en: Hundreds of innocent civilians had been slaughtered by government troops.
sentences.cn: 数百名无辜平民遭政府军屠杀。

sentences.en: I couldn't stand to watch them slaughter the cattle.
sentences.cn: 我不忍看他们宰牛.

sentences.en: I'm really terrified to witness the slaughter.
sentences.cn: 我亲眼目睹这场屠杀,真吓得毛发倒竖.

sentences.en: It was wholesale slaughter of women and children.
sentences.cn: 那是对妇女和儿童的大规模屠杀。

sentences.en: Lack of chicken feed means that chicken farms are having to slaughter their stock.
sentences.cn: 饲料不足意味着养鸡场将不得不宰杀鸡。

sentences.en: Men, women and children were slaughtered and villages destroyed.
sentences.cn: 村庄被毁，男人、女人和儿童惨遭杀戮。

sentences.en: More than 491,000 sheep were exported to the Continent for slaughter last year.
sentences.cn: 去年有491,000多只羊被出口到欧洲大陆供宰杀。

sentences.en: More than half a million sheep are sent from Britain to Europe for slaughter every year.
sentences.cn: 每年有50多万头羊被从英国运到欧洲宰杀。

sentences.en: Parliament has passed an act forbidding the slaughter of animals for pleasure.
sentences.cn: 议会通过了一项禁止杀生取乐的法令.

sentences.en: That wasn't war , it was simply slaughter.
sentences.cn: 这哪是械斗, 简直是一场诛戮.

sentences.en: The annual slaughter of wildlife in Italy is horrific.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，每年大量捕杀野生动物的现象令人震惊。

sentences.en: The barbaric slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman.
sentences.cn: 对鲸的野蛮屠杀既不必要也不人道。

sentences.en: The cattle are being fattened for slaughter.
sentences.cn: 喂肥牛群以宰杀。

sentences.en: the export of live animals for slaughter
sentences.cn: 屠宰用活畜的出口

sentences.en: the slaughter of defenceless women and children
sentences.cn: 对毫无自卫能力的妇孺的杀戮

sentences.en: The slaughter was horrific.
sentences.cn: 屠杀令人震惊。

sentences.en: They cynically tried to trade off a reduction in the slaughter of dolphins against a resumption of commercial whaling.
sentences.cn: 他们见利忘义地试图以减少屠杀海豚数量作为交换条件，重启商业捕鲸。

sentences.en: We follow their every word like lambs to the slaughter.
sentences.cn: 我们对他们完全言听计从。

sentences.en: We're fattening the livestock up for slaughter.
sentences.cn: 我们正在催肥牲畜待宰杀.

to kill a lot of people in a cruel or violent way
